transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello, hi ma'am, good morning.

Executive: Uh, ma'am, Meenakshi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Aapne kal evening me mujhe call kiya tha ma'am.

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Ma'am, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu Meenakshi. Aapne kal evening me call kiya tha mujhe, right?

Customer: Ha, ha kiya tha.

Executive: Ji, ji, ji. To ma'am, aap mujhe batayenge abhi agar aap free ho to abhi mai aapko thoda sa

Customer: Ji?

Customer: Ha, free hai, boliye.

Executive: Free ho na aap abhi? Thik hai, to mai ek kaam karti hu, aapko mai link share karti hu ma'am. Video meeting se aap ek baar connect kijiye, usse mai aapko guide karti hu.

Customer: Okay?

Customer: Aapko kya IndiaMART ko kya karna hai?

Executive: Ma'am, aapse meri kal discussion hui thi na IndiaMART services ke regarding.

Customer: Ha, ha.

Executive: Haanji. To aapko maine kaha tha ki kuch uh aapke jo owner hai na, Swizzl ma'am, right? Ha. Ha. Ha. To unhone kaha tha ki uh products me kuch updation vgera karni hai, maine kaha tha na aapko?

Customer: Ha, aapne. Unse already discuss ho gaya tha.

Executive: Ha. Goa location ke liye jo aap keh rahe the na, Goa location ki buyleads chahiye only, hai na? Ha. To jo aapki other location already added hai na profile me, vo mai aapko bata deti hu kaha se remove karna hai, so that aapko other location se buyleads show na ho. Thik hai? Ha.

Executive: Okay? Ye mai aapko ek baar bata deti hu taaki fir aapko bhi aage se yaad ho jaaye, thik hai? Ha, thik hai.

Executive: Okay. To link mai aapko ma'am uh mail pe hi bheju, official mail pe?

Customer: Whatsapp kijiye.

Executive: Ek minute ruk jaaiye, mail mai aapko bata rahi hu ek minute.

Executive: Ye Swizzl Diet ke hi naam se hai na mail ID jo official hai? Ha, lekin vo unko jaayega na.

Executive: Achha, unpe jaayega? To vo aapka personal hai?

Customer: Thik hai.

Executive: Okay, okay, no problem. Mai ek kaam karu, mai aapko whatsapp pe hi bhej rahi hu. Ha, bhej dijiye. Wait a minute.

(silence)

Customer: [unintelligible]

(silence)

Executive: Uh, ma'am, whatsapp pe hi mai aapko link share kar rahi hu, thik hai?

Customer: Ha, thik hai.

(silence)

Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Uh, ma'am, whatsapp check kijiye, aapko link aaya hoga.

Customer: Whatsapp nahi aaya hai.

Executive: Ha, isi ko aap, ha, isi ko join kar lo ma'am, thik hai? Ye vali call mai cut kar de rahi hu.

Customer: Ha, thik hai.

Executive: Okay, ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove other locations from profile.

- Wants buyleads for Goa location only.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to share link on WhatsApp.

- Agreed to guide on removing other locations.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, location
